Html:
Hi Guys,

First of all, you have one great framework and thanks for sharing it with us! Most of the suites are so expensive for home developers :-/
I just found it and saw that there is a roadmap for 1.5 / 2.0.

Now can you give me the timing on these roadmap (approx). Especially the 2.0 then :-)
Have you used mRibbon as base for your ribbon implementation?

Thanks & keep on doing a great job!
Nick
